ideas.title: Business Development Management System
ideas.description: World-class business development system for Andrew's garden buildings business. End-to-end: lead capture (from configurator), CRM, quoting, scheduling, project tracking, customer communication. Must work for a bespoke builder, not a widget seller.
ideas.notes:
Andrew's directive 14 Feb 2026: 'I want to make you responsible for delivering a world class business development management system.'

This is James's PRIMARY responsibility.

Research phases:
1. Market research — what systems exist, what's best-in-class
2. Andrew's business workflow mapping — enquiry to completion
3. Gap analysis — what's missing today
4. System architecture proposal — build/buy/integrate
5. Feature spec — detailed requirements
6. Implementation plan — phased delivery roadmap
7. Prototype / MVP

Key considerations:
- Configurator is the front door — leads come from 3D config sessions
- Bespoke business = every job is different (not cookie-cutter)
- Site visits, custom quoting, build scheduling
- Small team — system must be lean, not enterprise bloat
- Automation opportunities: config → lead → quote → schedule
